#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define lli long long int
#define s(x) scanf("%lld", &x)
#define MAXX 100005

using namespace std;

lli fltu[MAXX][201] = {0};
lli arr[MAXX] = {0};

int main()
{
    lli n,a,b,q,i,j,k;

    s(n);
    s(q);

    while (q--) {
        s(a);
        s(b);

        if (a > 200) {
            j = b;
            for (i = 1; j <= n; ++i) {
                ++arr[j];
                j += a;
            }
        } else {
            ++fltu[b][a];
        }
    }

    for (i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
        for (j = 1; j <= 200; ++j) {
            arr[i] += fltu[i][j];

            if (i+j <= n)
                fltu[i+j][j] += fltu[i][j];
        }
    }

    for (i = 1; i <= n; ++i)
        printf("%lld ", arr[i]);

    printf("\n");


    return 0;
}
